content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
On Mon, 1 Feb 2016, Jasmin Blanchette wrote:

I have prepared a changeset to point to the right documentation
("isabelle doc datatypes"). Makarius, please apply the attached changset
patch to "isabelle-release".

Done. See
https://bitbucket.org/isabelle_project/isabelle-release/commits/a00306a1c71a

I took out two references to "isabelle-hol", but there are two left in
the tutorial.

That is the old tutorial from 2002. It has not been maintained in the
last 10 years. We should probably move that to the "Old Manuals" section
at some point.

I'm not sure what happened to this document

The "logics-HOL" manual was discontinued in Isabelle2014. Its remains
have been assimilated into isar-ref (section "Higher-Order Logic").

Makarius
